roles.description: Designed and implemented scalable web architectures, improving application load times by 35%. Led and mentored junior developers, reviewing PRs and enforcing clean architecture best practices. Collaborated with stakeholders to define architecture and tech stack for new projects.

Developed MutualData, a platform for massive data processing and visualization. Built reusable UI components and integrated APIs for Tus Cuentas (investment platform). Migrated La Medica e-commerce from CSHTML to Next.js 15 and Cras app from Angular to Next.js 15, reducing technical debt.

Implemented responsive designs using Next.js, TypeScript, ChakraUI and SASS. Applied Agile SCRUM methodology, CI/CD pipelines and GitLab workflows. Participated in WSLaMedica, Mis Inversiones and MutualData projects.

description: Developed online casino platforms, bot applications and Web3 landing pages. Applied Styled Components, Tailwind CSS and Framer Motion for high-quality animations. Ensured responsiveness and API integration aligned with UX/UI designs.
Developed a role-based access application with login and user privilege management using Python.
